tgt_original: 苦有三者，一所取苦，我法二執所依取故；

src_original: lakṣaṇatas triduḥkhatālakṣaṇatvāt /
tgt_original: 二事相苦，三苦相故；

src_original: saṃbandhataś ca duḥkhasaṃbandhāt [/
tgt_original: 三和合苦，苦相合故。

src_original: ] tatraiva mūlatatve yathākramaṃ veditavyam /  abhāvaś cāpy atadbhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śūnyatā matā /  parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ na kenacit prakāreṇāstīty abhāva evāsya śūnyatā paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā parikalpyate na tu sarvathā nāstīti tasyātadbhāvaḥ (/
tgt_original: 空有三者，一無性空，性非有故； 二異性空，與妄所執自性異故；

src_original: ) śūnyatā [/  ] pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvam eveti prakṛtir evāsya śūnyatā /
tgt_original: 三自性空，二空所顯為自性故。

src_original: alakṣaṇaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ tadvilakṣaṇam eva ca // III.7
tgt_original: 無我三者，一無相無我，我相無故；

src_original: svalakṣaṇañ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /  parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstīty alakṣaṇam evāsya nairātmyaṃ [/  ] paratantrasyāsti lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yathā parikalpyata iti tadvilakṣaṇam asya lakṣaṇan nairātmyaṃ /  pariniṣpannas tu svabhāvo nairātmyam eveti prakṛtir evāsya nairātmyam iti trividhe  mūlatatve trividhānityatā paridīpitā asadarthānityatā utpādabhaṅgānityatā samalanirmalānityatā ca /  trividhā duḥkhatā upādānaduḥkhatā lakṣaṇaduḥkhatā saṃbandhaduḥkhatā (Mvbh 40) ca /
tgt_original: 二異相無我，與妄所執我相異故；

src_original: trividhā śūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā atadbhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā ca trividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ alakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ /  vilakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ svalakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ ca /  phalahetumayan tatvaṃ tatraiva mūlatatve duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyatvaṃ [/  ] kathaṃ trividhaṃ mūlatatvaṃ duḥkhādisatyatvaṃ [/  ] yatas tad anityādilakṣaṇaṃ /  duḥkhasatyam ato mataṃ
tgt_original: 三自相無我，無我所顯為自相故。

src_original: trividhena samudayārthena samudayasatyaṃ [/  ] trividhaḥ samudayārthaḥ /  vāsanātha samutthānam avisaṃyoga eva ca // III.8  vāsanāsamudayaḥ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā samutthānasamudayaḥ karmakleśāḥ /
tgt_original: 集諦三者，一習氣集，謂遍計所執自性執習氣，執彼習氣假立彼名； 二等起集，謂業煩惱；

src_original: avisaṃyogasamudayaḥ /  tathatāyā āvaraṇāvisaṃyogaḥ /
tgt_original: 三未離繫集，謂未離障真如。

src_original: trividhena nirodhena nirodhasatyaṃ [/  ] trividho nirodhaḥ /
tgt_original: 滅諦三者，一自性滅，自性不生故；

src_original: svabhāvadvayanotpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ mataṃ /  svabhāvānutpattir grāhyagrāhakayor anutpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam ity eṣa trividho nirodho yad uta svabhāvanirodho dvayanirodhaḥ /  prakṛtinirodhaś ca /
tgt_original: 二二取滅，謂擇滅，二取不生故；

src_original: mārgasatyaṃ trividhe mūlatatve kathaṃ vyavasthāpyate /  parijñāyāṃ prahāṇe ca prāptisākṣātkṛtāv ayaṃ [//] III.9  mārgasatyaṃ samākhyātaṃ /
tgt_original: 三本性滅，謂真如故。 道諦三者，一遍知道，能知遍計所執故；

src_original: parikalpitasya parijñāne paratantrasya parijñāne prahāṇe ca /
tgt_original: 二永斷道，能斷依他起故；

src_original: pariniṣpannasya parijñāne prāptisākṣātkaraṇe ca evam atra parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatyavyavasthānam iti veditavyaṃ [/]
tgt_original: 三作證道，能證圓成實故。 然遍知道亦通後二，七三三性如次配釋。

src_original: [5. Audārikasūkṣmatattva]  audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 今於此中所配三性，或假或實如理應知。 三解脫門所行境界，與此三性相攝云何？

src_original: tayā saṃvṛtisatyatvaṃ mūlatatve yathākramaṃ veditavyaṃ /  paramārthan tu ekataḥ // III.10
tgt_original: 此三云何攝彼二諦？ 應知世俗具此三種，勝義唯是圓成實性。

src_original: ekasmāt pariniṣpannād eva svabhāvād veditavyaṃ /  sa punaḥ kathaṃ paramārthaḥ /  arthaprāptiprapattyā hi paramārthas tridhā mataḥ /
tgt_original: 世俗有三，一假世俗、二行世俗、三顯了世俗，如次應知即此三性。 勝義有三：

src_original: arthaparamārthas tathatā paramasya jñānasyārtha iti kṛtvā /
tgt_original: 一義勝義，謂真如勝之義故；

src_original: prāptiparamārtho nirvāṇaṃ paramo 'rtha iti kṛtvā pratipattiparamārtho mārgaḥ paramo 'syārtha iti kṛtvā [/
tgt_original: 二得勝義，謂涅槃勝即義故；
